      • isOutY

        public boolean isOutY()
        Checks if the ball will remain within the height boundaries.
        Returns:
        true if the ball will leave the top or bottom, false otherwise

      • isOutX

        public boolean isOutX()
        Checks if the ball will remain within the width boundaries.
        Returns:
        true if the ball will leave the left or right, false otherwise

      • moveOneStep

        public void moveOneStep()
        Moves the ball one step by its velocity. Performs collision check and notifies the collided object as well.
